Description of incident: "A large mailing was mailed out by our third party vendor. Three COUNTRY Financial packages containing documents with individual personally identifiable information (PII) failed to be delivered by the United States Postal Service to the servicing COUNTRY Representative. They have also been unable to track the current location of these three packages. One additional package containing the same documents was damaged while in transit with the United States Postal Service. In their attempt to resolve the issue they removed the documents and repackaged them. All documents were received by the COUNTRY Representative."Records breached include Account Numbers and SSN.
